dsOverview.title: Barkstrom's Earth Radiation Budget Experiment (ERBE), 1984Nov-1986Oct

summary.p: Separate data for the scanner and wide field instruments. From NASA. The data are: daily longwave radiation and albedo; hourly longwave and albedo, average for the month; monthly mean longwave and albedo.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NASA/GSFC/NSSDC > National Space Science Data Center, Goddard Space Flight Center, NASA

reference.title: The Nimbus Earth Radiation Budget (ERB) Experiment: 1975 to 1992
